rows.label: tev065401_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Gi Nagri about the Wrothian way of life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Gi Nagri if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG0001
rows.name:
Other xenoforms often ask me why the Wrothians
are possessed with such war-lust.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG0002
rows.name:
But they are mistaken. My people have no love of war.
We only take up arms to ensure our own survival.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG0003
rows.name:
Our homeworld was all but barren—nothing like Mira
with its rich supply of resources.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG0004
rows.name:
To keep living, a Wrothian had to train, build strength,
and fight to win his daily bread.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG0005
rows.name:
I myself cannot stand the sight of blood, so I took an
apprenticeship with Master De Zing as a swordsmith.
I wage my battles vicariously, you might say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG0008
rows.name:
I have taken an apprenticeship with the master
swordsmith De Zing in order to learn the trade.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG0009
rows.name:
But I have far to go. The master makes as much clear
in his frequent scoldings.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG0010
rows.name:
Still, I take nothing for granted. Now that I am free
of Ganglion and able to make my living in this
bountiful land, I intend to do so with vigor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG0011
rows.name:
I will advance my skills and become a great smith
capable of forging an unbreakable sword![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG0012
rows.name:
The hammer is heavy and the road is long,
but my patience is endless.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_SEL1011
rows.name:
Ask Gi Nagri how events have
changed the Wrothian way of life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Gi Nagri about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG1001
rows.name:
By eliminating the Ganglion, you have eliminated the
greatest threat to me and my fellow Wrothians.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG1002
rows.name:
Perhaps we embark now for a world where the sword
no longer need leave its sheath.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG1003
rows.name:
But unsheathe it my brethren shall, if for nothing else
then to keep body and mind fit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG1004
rows.name:
And I shall continue my swing of the hammer,
wringing mighty blades from the wisdom and
techniques the master has left to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG0013
rows.name:
My master has been making a name for himself all
over again in Cauldros, not as a maker of blades,
but as a wielder of one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG0014
rows.name:
From what I have heard, a single swing is all he needs
to put an end to even the most dire indigen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG0015
rows.name:
As for me, I have kept his forge traditions alive.
Every day I swing my hammer, aiming to improve.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG0016
rows.name:
One day, I hope to create a blade that surprises even
the master and deliver it to him in Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Gi Nagri about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG0017
rows.name:
The master truly is remarkable. Now he endeavors to
create an unbreakable sword massive enough for a
Skell to swing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG0018
rows.name:
Surely he is the first in this wide universe to strike upon
such a lofty idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG0019
rows.name:
Master De Zing is a Wrothian treasure!
A talent without equal![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG0020
rows.name:
If I must follow him my whole life to help him achieve
his grand dreams, then I shall—or my name is not
Gi Nagri![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_SEL3021
rows.name: Ask Gi Nagri if he's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG0021
rows.name:
Do you know two warriors named Gi Ziorde and
Gi Ziordo? They are pupils of the famous Go Belg.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG0022
rows.name:
However, after losing a fight to some human,
they departed on a quest to train and become stronger.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG0023
rows.name: I must say, I envy them. I have no fellow apprentices.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG0024
rows.name:
A friendly rival would spur me on when discouragement
with my work gets the better of me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065401_MSG0025
rows.name:
What about you? Have you a companion who brings
out your finest?[ST:wait ]
